entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
RAIN LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

SNOW LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS AROUND 30
CHANCE OF SNOW 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
RAIN, SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW IN THE AFTERNOON
NEW LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 60 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE MORNING, THEN SNOW LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF SNOW 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SNOW LIKELY IN THE EVENING
NEW LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 60 PERCENT

HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
LOWS AROUND 20

HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
